title: Secrets for Seducing a Royal Bodyguard
description: Accomplished spy Aden St. George prefers to stay away from the frivolous ton, especially after the way his mother was used by the Prince Regent. But his latest mission compels him to guard unconventional, vibrant Lady Vivien Shaw. Rescuing her from kidnappers was easy, resisting her beauty is not. Though grateful for Adenâ€™s help, Vivien has secrets she must keep hidden.
author: Vanessa Kelly
